title: O’Reilly Faces CAIR Official Who Slammed Him for ‘Racist’ Stereotypes on Watters World
text:
Published By: Media Ite - Today 
Bill O'Reilly tonight faced off with a CAIR official who called him out for a Watters World segment pushing "racist" stereotypes....
